## libuse

A library to deal with ooc .use files, notably:

  * Find them from the `$OOC_LIBS` environment variable
  * Parse them, including version blocks

It was extracted from [rock][rock] and for [oc][oc].

### Authors

  * Amos Wenger (nddrylliog)
  * Probably other rock authors
  
### Links

  * [rock][rock], the ooc compiler
  * [oc][oc], the ooc piler
  
[rock]: https://github.com/nddrylliog/rock
[oc]: https://github.com/nddrylliog/oc
